articles.title: Taking Stock: Indices end at record closing high; IT, realty stocks lead - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: More than 200 stocks including Oberoi Realty, Asian Paints, Persistent Systems, Kolte-Patil Developers, IRCTC, Ajmera Realty hit a 52-week high on the BSE.
articles.content:
Indian benchmark indices ended higher for the third straight session and posted a record closing high on September 6, helped by IT and realty stocks.
